welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Pyrgos, Greece! Located in the heart of the beautiful Peloponnese region, our charming city is known for its picturesque architecture and rich history. We invite you to immerse yourself in its beauty and discover all that Pyrgos has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Andravida Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Andravida Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zakinthos International Airport offers a variety of services and facilities for travelers.

terminals.name: VIP Terminal
terminals.description: The VIP terminal at Zakinthos International Airport provides exclusive services for VIP travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
